page.title: 12Plenmeller Village.
page.content: Plenmeller is a small village with no church and no shop. There is one post box. The electoral roll shows 30 people. There is no school. One house was once used to train domestic workers. Another house was the pit office of{Plenmeller Colliery. There is a farm at each end of the village. One of the farms has two stockmen, 2 general farm and timber workers and a gamekeeper to keep the heather down to ankle length. He also catches moles, rabbits and Corbie crows that attack young lambs. There is a lot of{farm machinery:}Twenty tractors, silage trailers, hay turners, forage harvesters, a hay bob and a muck spreader.
